main event: A sighting of an unidentified object took place on September 27, 1957, in Kansas City, Missouri, during which it was observed potentially in conjunction with flight paths of aircraft.
interesting points: The sighting involved multiple types of observations, including ground and air visuals as well as radar detection., The object's course was recorded moving from west to east to northeast., The observation was likely caused by an aircraft according to comments in the report., The sighting lasted between ten to fifteen seconds., This report is part of the Project Blue Book archives, which documented UFO sightings.
witness description: Civilian source reporting the sighting with observations possibly linked to aircraft activity.
